<<<<<<< HEAD
Edinburgh, the twenty one day of December, 1676. Instructions given by His Majesties Privy Council, to the persons appointed by them, to be common tasters of ale and drinking-beer within the city of Edinburgh, and suburbs thereof, Cannon-gate, Leith, and the burghs royal in the shires of Edinburgh, Linlithgow, Haddingtoun, &c. Scotland. Privy Council.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to the Kings most sacred Majesty, Edinburgh : Anno Dom. 1676.
Caption title. Royal arms at head of text; initial letter. Imperfect: stained with slight loss of text. Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
=======

Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to the Kings most sacred Majesty, Edinburgh : Anno Dom. 1676.
